DOC.brief_summary: This is an observational safety study of a prophylactic use of Flu Egg Derived Adjuvanted Swine Origin A(H1N1) Vaccine in subjects 6 months of age and older. Subjects may receive either 1 or 2 doses: children and elderly will receive 2 doses and adults will receive either 1 or 2 doses.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Safety Study of Adjuvanted Swine Origin A (H1N1) Pandemic Subunit Egg Derived Vaccine
DOC.criteria: Subject's age in accordance with the approved product label of the country where the study is conducted Subjects will be vaccinated with Focetria®, independently of this study. Subjects or parent/guardian willing to provide informed consent prior to vaccination administration and complete all of the study, including followup contact • Received any prior H1N1 vaccination
